name: GOAL_CONTACT
description: This table contains contact specific data for the IGO (Discrete Goals) master file.

columns.name: GOAL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the goal record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: The DTE contact date for the goal record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CP_PRIORITY_C_NAME
columns.description: The priority assigned to this goal.

columns.name: START_DATE
columns.description: The date to begin work on this goal.

columns.name: END_DATE
columns.description: The date work on this goal was completed.

columns.name: EXP_END_DATE
columns.description: The date work on this goal is expected to be completed.

columns.name: GOAL_OUTCOME_C_NAME
columns.description: The outcome(s) associated with a care plan goal.

columns.name: EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: This item holds edited user ID information.

columns.name: EDIT_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: PATH_OUTCOME_VAL_C_NAME
columns.description: The category number for the documentation value assigned to this pathway outcome for this contact.

columns.name: PATH_OUTCOME_VAR_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the variance that was documented on this pathway outcome for this contact.

columns.name: CARE_PLAN_CSN_ID
columns.description: Links to the care plan contact. Used to recreate historic versions of the care plan.

columns.name: INCLUDE_DESC_YN
columns.description: If set to Yes, the goal description will be included on the plan of care. If set to No or left blank, the goal description will be omitted.

columns.name: HAS_NOTE_EDIT_YN
columns.description: Y means that, for this reading, the default smarttext has been pulled in at least once.

columns.name: READING_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Documents when the original reading contact was documented. Used to order active documentation readings in the order they clinically happened.

columns.name: UPDATED_GOAL_ID
columns.description: This item links to the new goal ID that was created when this original goal was resolved and updated.

columns.name: REASON_FOR_UPDATE
columns.description: This item contains the reason as to why this goal was completed and updated.
